ResearchProjectDef.label: stockpile crates
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows colonists to build large crates for more compact storage.

ResearchProjectDef.label: stockpile crates II
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows colonists to build reinforced stockpile crates.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Wireless item transfer
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows colonists to build cargo platforms and I/O ports. I/O ports can transfer items remotely to and from cargo platforms.
